thread.title: HTC defends new handset by reportedly pointing copycat finger at Apple
thread.title_full: HTC defends new handset by reportedly pointing copycat finger at Apple

title: HTC defends new handset by reportedly pointing copycat finger at Apple
text:
HTC defends new handset by reportedly pointing copycat finger at Apple 
Cnet Friday 23rd October, 2015 
Technically Incorrect: An HTC executive, stung by reviews suggesting the Taiwanese handset maker's new phone is too similar to the iPhone, reportedly insists that it's Apple who's the copier....
